Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates

Class AbstractBuyDevCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates.AbstractClientState
it.polimi.ingsw.client.clientstates.AbstractBuyDevCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyDevCardCLI, BuyDevCardGUI
public abstract class AbstractBuyDevCard
extends AbstractClientState
This class represents the generic ui state that is reached when the client chooses to buy a Development Card during his turn.
